title: Learning the vi and Vim Editors.epub
description: The standard guide for vi since 1986, this book has been expanded to include detailed information on vim, the leading vi clone that includes extra features for both beginners and power users. You learn text editing basics and advanced tools for both editors, such as writing macros and scripts to extend the editor, power tools for programmers, multi-window editing -- all in the easy-to-follow style that has made this book a classic.
